main.aboutusdesc: ʻO General Store ke kikowaena hale kūʻai o nā hale kūʻai lālā ʻo General Store a puni ka honua e hana nei i nā mea hoʻokaʻawale kūikawā o nā mana kaulana.
main.subscribedesc: E ʻoluʻolu e hoʻokomo i kāu leka uila inā makemake ʻoe e loaʻa nā nūhou hou mai iā mākou.
main.subscribesend: Ua hoʻouna maikaʻi ʻia ke noi <strong> maikaʻi
main.checkingregistereddata: Ke nānā nei i nā ʻikepili i hoʻopaʻa inoa ʻia
main.viewregistereddata: E nānā i ka ʻikepili i hoʻopaʻa inoa ʻia
main.allrightsreserved: Ua mālama ʻia nā kuleana āpau

title: E hāʻawi iā %s
subtitle: E kau inoa i kēia manawa no ka manawa e lanakila ai %s!

section1.sDesc1: Ma aneʻi wale ʻoe e kiʻi ai i nā keu pono he nui, maʻalahi e hui pū, nā huahana hāʻawi maikaʻi loa a me nā keu pono ʻē aʻe

item.descItem2: ʻAʻole e uku i nā uku ke loaʻa iā ʻoe kahi makana.
item.descItem3: E kiʻi iā GiveAway ma lalo o 24 mau hola!

timer.timerTitle: Pau nā bonus komo manuahi ma:

banner1.bDesc1: Inā ʻoe i hoʻopaʻa inoa, e nānā i kāu leka uila i kēlā me kēia manawa e kiʻi i ka ʻike hou mai iā mākou. E hāʻawi pū mākou i nā palapala hōʻoia no ke kūʻai ʻana ma kā mākou hale kūʻai me ka uku ʻole. He aha kāu mea e kali ai! Hoʻomaka

section2.sTitleBefore2: E haʻi i kāu mau hoaaloha i kēia manawa
section2.sTitle2: E kiʻi iā All Free GiveAway
section2.sDesc2: Koho i ka makana āu e makemake ai, hiki iā ʻoe ke lawe pū i ka hāʻawi manawaleʻa a pau mai ka papa inoa a mākou e hoʻolako ai ma lalo nei.

banner2.bTitle2: Nā Manaʻo Māmā a maʻalahi hoʻi
banner2.bDesc2: Wale ma ke hoʻopaʻa inoa ʻana iā ʻoe iho hiki iā ʻoe ke komo i kā mākou hāʻawi manawaleʻa. He aha kāu mea e kali ai! e E hoʻopaʻa inoa iā ʻoe iho i kēia manawa.

section3.sDesc3: E kiʻi i kahi giveAway manuahi ma lalo o 24 mau hola! Mai haʻalele i kēia manawa kūpono ʻole, maʻalahi loa ia, e hoʻopaʻa inoa wale ma kā mākou pūnaewele a lawe i ke ana (inā loaʻa), ʻaʻole pono ʻoe e uku i kekahi mea. Mahalo nui!

step1.ssDesc11: E loaʻa ai ka manawa e lanakila ai i ka %s, ʻo nā mea āu e pono ai e hoʻopiha i kāu palapala hoʻopaʻa inoa moʻohelu kālā. E hoʻomaka, e hoʻokomo wale i ka hoʻokūkū me kāu leka uila.

step2.ssDesc21: I ka manawa e komo ai i loko, loaʻa iā ʻoe ka manawa kūpono e kiʻi i nā mea komo hou aʻe ma o ka hoʻopau ʻana i nā hana like ʻole, e like me ke kipa ʻana i kā mākou pūnaewele media.
step2.ssDesc22: Ua kuleana ʻoe e hoʻopau i nā hana āu e makemake ai, hāʻawi kēlā me kēia hana i kahi helu kūikawā o nā mea komo a ʻo kēlā me kēia komo ʻana he mea lanakila paha ia.
step2.ssDesc23: Hiki iā ʻoe ke lele i nā hana no $ 1 wale nō.

step3.ssDesc31: Hana ʻia. E hoʻopili koke aku mākou iā ʻoe e pili ana i ka hoʻopili i hoʻopihapiha ʻia i ka manawa o ke kau inoa ʻana ma kā mākou pūnaewele.

banner3.bTitle3: E hāʻawi iā %s ma ke ala nui.
banner3.bDesc3: Hāʻawi kēia hanana i nā kau lanakila hou aʻe ma mua o ka makahiki i hala. E kono i kou mau hoaaloha a me kou ʻohana no nā manawa kūpono ʻoi aku. E hoʻopaʻa inoa i kēia manawa ma mua o ka hoʻomaka ʻana o kēia hanana.

section4.sDesc4: ʻO kekahi mau loiloi o nā mea lanakila

theWinner.coment1: Mahalo iā ʻoe no ka Cash, lana koʻu manaʻo e nui ana ka lehulehu o kāu hale kūʻai.
theWinner.coment2: He hale kūʻai kaulana ʻo GeneralStore maoli kēia, ua kūleʻa ka pūʻolo i loaʻa iaʻu, kumu ʻia ka huahana, a ʻaʻole wau i uku i nā uku. Mahalo iā 'oe.
theWinner.coment3: I ka manawa mua ʻaʻole wau i manaʻoʻiʻo, akā ma hope o kaʻu hoʻopili ʻana iā lākou ua ʻike ʻia he GeneralStore ia. mahalo iā GeneralStore no %s.
theWinner.coment4: Mahalo i ke akua no ka hoʻonui ʻana i koʻu laki, mahalo no ka hāʻawi ʻana, GeneralStore aloha wau iā ia.

section5.sTitleBefore5: ʻO ka holo maʻalahi o kā mākou hanana & ʻoihana
section5.sDesc5: ʻO kā mākou mahalo no ke kākoʻo piha e kōkua mau iā mākou
section5.dSupport1: ʻO ka ʻenehana ʻenehana multinational ʻAmelika e hoʻokumu ʻia ma Seattle, Wakinekona, ka mea e kia ana i ka e-commerce, ke ao kamepiula, ke kahe kikohoʻe, a me ka ʻike hana.
section5.dSupport2: Ke kūʻai aku nei ka mea kūʻai aku pūnaewele ʻo ʻAmelika i nā lako pono i hoʻokumu ʻia ma Midvale, Utah, kokoke i Salt Lake City. Ua hoʻokumu ʻo Patrick M. Byrne iā Overstock.com i ka makahiki 1999.
section5.dSupport3: ʻO ka hui kalepa multinational American e hana nei i ke kaulahao o nā hypermarkets, nā hale kūʻai kūʻai hōʻemi, a me nā hale kūʻai mai ʻAmelika Hui Pū ʻIa, ke keʻena nui ma Bentonville, Arkansas.
section5.dSupport4: ʻO ka mea kūʻai aku uila uila lehulehu ʻAmelika ma ke keʻena nui i Richfield, Minnesota. Ua hoʻokumu mua ʻia ia e Richard M. Schulze lāua ʻo James Wheeler i ka makahiki 1966 ma ke ʻano he hale kūʻai loea leo i kapa ʻia ʻo Sound of Music.
section5.dSupport5: ʻO ka lawelawe kūʻai kūʻai pūnaewele e hoʻokumu ʻia ma Kina e ka Alibaba Group. Hoʻomaka ʻia ma 2010, hana ʻia i mau ʻoihana liʻiliʻi ma Kina a me nā wahi ʻē aʻe, e like me Singapore, e hāʻawi nei i nā huahana i nā mea kūʻai aku ma ka pūnaewele.
section5.dSupport6: ʻO ka ʻoihana e-commerce multinational ʻAmelika e hoʻokumu ʻia ma San Jose, Kaleponi, e kōkua ana i nā mea kūʻai aku i nā mea kūʻai aku a me nā ʻoihana aku i nā mea kūʻai aku ma o kāna pūnaewele.

section6.sDesc6: Inā he mau nīnau kāu e pili ana i kahi huahana, a i ʻole kekahi ʻikepili āu e makemake ai, e ʻoluʻolu e hoʻokaʻaʻike mai iā mākou.
section6.subject: Kumuhana
section6.writeyourmessagehere: Kākau i kāu leka ma aneʻi.
section6.sendsuccess: Hoʻouna maikaʻi ʻia ka leka uila
section6.sendsuccess1: E pane mākou i ka hiki wawe.
